articles.title: Darum macht Polen den Milliardendeal mit Südkorea statt mit Deutschland
articles.image_title: S. Korean aerobatic team in Poland This photo, provided by the Air Force, shows the South Korean aerobatic flight team Black Eagles staging a performance aboard T-50 trainer jets at an air base in Deblin, about 120 kilometers southeast of Warsaw, on July 27, 2022. The Polish government signed a contract to purchase 48 FA-50 light attack fighters from Korea Aerospace Industries the same day. (PHOTO NOT FOR SALE) (Yonhap)/2022-07-28 15:04:00/
